Label: Editor-B 3 second data, Magnetic Field Instrument, Geotail - S. Kokubun (STELAB Nagoya Univ., Japan)

DatasetLink.Title: ISAS DARTS
DatasetLink.Text: 3-sec MGF magnetic field data supplied by and also available at

VariableDescription.Name: BGSE
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Magnetic field vector in GSE cartesian coordinates (no Bz offset correction)
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           Geotail Magnetic Field
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     GEOTAIL>Geomagnetic tail
#     DATA_TYPE                       EDB3SEC>Editor-B 3 second (no correction for Bz offset))
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MGF>Magnetic Field
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     MODS                            Created by S.-H. Chen on 6/18/97; Adapted from GE_FO_MGF
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0087
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 ge_edb3sec_mgf_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  ge_edb3sec_mgf
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Editor-B 3 second data, Magnetic Field Instrument, Geotail
#     PI_NAME                         S. Kokubun
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  STELAB Nagoya Univ., Japan
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     LINK_TEXT                       3-sec MGF magnetic field data supplied by and also available at
#     LINK_TITLE                      ISAS DARTS
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.darts.isas.ac.jp/stp/geotail/ascii.html
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Geotail_MGF_Magnetic-Fields-EditorB_3sec_cdf
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Geotail
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Geotail/MGF/EDB.PT3S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Number of milliseconds since the epoch
#  2. Magnetic field vector in GSE cartesian coordinates (no Bz offset correction)
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:12:38 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Magnetic field vector in GSE cartesian coordinates (no Bz offset correction)
#
EPOCH                                 BX_(GSE)               BY_(GSE)               BZ_(GSE)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                      nT                     nT                     nT
01-09-1993 00:00:02.669                8.99000               0.340000               0.390000
